title: Guerrilla Collective Indie Showcase Announced - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.11.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk about the backlash to Inside Xbox's "gameplay," the fact that the next Horizon will look good (lol), and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:01:30 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack, Al Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:02:40 - The Elder Scrolls 6: Next News Will Likely Be 'Years From Now' - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:16:45 - Guerrilla Collective, a Huge Indie Games Showcase has been Announced for June - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:22:20 - Does the announcement of this conference prod deeper into the rumor that Sony will be doing some sort of announcement on June 4th? Or do you think it'll be sooner? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:24:00 - Ubisoft announces “Ubisoft Forward”
00:28:35 - Former Titanfall and Apex Legends Devs have Started a New Studio “Gravity Well” - Alessandro Barbosa @ Gamespot
00:32:10 - Mafia announcements are incoming
00:36:35 - The PlayStation Store has been suspended in China - Vikki Blake @ Eurogamer
00:38:50 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:41:40 - If the Mario 64 for Switch rumor for this year is true, do you think this means there won't be a possibility for the N64 library coming to Switch Online? - ZOMBIEHIGHX23
00:46:40 - Shoutou to Kyle! - It doesn't matter
00:47:20 -  - Ignacio Rojas
00:57:40 - Squad Up:Chris(PS4) - snodude44
00:58:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Imran
